|cpu1chip1 = Ralink;RT3052; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24KEc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 384 <!-- 384 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX29LV320DBTI-70G; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->

|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->

|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "M01-BG419-E10" is silkscreened on the board. :Per '''ZyXEL''''s manual, the default SSID is '''ZyXEL'''.
The board for this device appears to be identical to :the [[ZyXEL NBG-419N v1]] ([[AboCom WR5205|AboCom WR5206]]). <small>Later update: it is in fact sharing the same hardware and FCC ID..</small>
==Links of Interest== *[http://www.ebay.com/itm/9dBi-RP-SMA-Antennas-2-for-ZyXEL-N-Access-Point-WAP3205-/110991205084?pt=US_Directional_Network_Antennas&hash=item19d79762dc ''mhzkid'''s antenna kit listing on eBay] (w/ an internal shot)
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|notrecommended}} {{OpenWrtNotice|insufficient}} {{OpenWrtNotice|endsupport|2022|19.07.10}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/zyxel/zyxel_wap3205_v1 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/zyxel/nbg419n |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ramips |subtarget = rt305x |arch = mipsel_24kc |support_started_version = 12.09 |current_supported_version = 19.07.10 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = WAP3205 v1 works with fw images for NBG-419N }} Please insert instructions here
